title: Siddharta DVD Concert Presernov trg, end of Petrolea tour
description:
This is a digital TV capture of the Siddharta&#039;s last Petrolea tour concert. The concert was performed for free in the center of Ljubljana on Presernov Trg on 27-12-2006. The DVD starts with band comments about the tour (in Slovene) then continues with the, unforunately, heavily cut concert. The concert was shortened from about 140 min of performance to aboout 75 min. The DVD has the following chapters:

01. Intro
02. Mr.Q / Petrolea
03. Pot v X / Id
04. Plastika / Petrolea
05. Napoj / Rh-
06. Ohm / Petrolea
07. T.H.O.R. / Rh-
08. Domine / Petrolea
09. Samo Edini / Nord
10. Neon / Nord
11. Homo Carnula / Petrolea
12. B Mashina / Nord
13. Disco Deluxe / Petrolea
14. Il a Modras / Petrolea
15. Neznano / Petrolea
16. Ring / Rh-
17. Male Roke / Petrolea
18. Na Soncu / Nord

BONUS : Interview with the band at the end of Petrolea Tour


This is a must for all rock fans...even if the songs are in Slovene. They are hard to understand sometimes anyway ;)
